thread.title: Cletus Fordwicke

author: Cletus Fordwicke
title: Cletus Fordwicke
text: Meets a fundamental need people have: sometime to travel without the pet. Pet sitting for others makes everyone happy. You travel; I see a new place; we all love animals. The result is we become friends. This is a brilliant concept which is executed perfectly. Communication is done indirectly through the company until a deal is struck. Pet owners and sitters provide public feedback for other browsers to review. Travel and be confident Fido is OK.
